metadata.subject: Louis XV, King of France, 1710-1774
Austrian Succession, War of, 1740-1748
metadata.title: Les campagnes du roy en 1744. & 1745.
metadata.creator: Collombat, Jacques-François, 1701-1751, printer, publisher
metadata.note: Bound in a volume with manuscript title page: Suite des conquêtes du roy, de sa maladie et de sa convalessence, et differentes pieces. Tome 9e.
metadata.publisher: A Paris : De l'imprimerie de Jacques-François Collombat, premier imprimeur ordinaire du roy, du cabinet & maison de Sa Majesté
metadata.description: Title and text within double line border; title vignette (royal arms of France); initial; head-piece
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Page numbers have been marked or altered. Damaged, stained, torn and/or loose pages. Some text may be lost in the binding.
